body_html: Sorry for the lack of updates, we do not at this time have a direct replacement for SyncReplicaOptimizer. On one machine you can use tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy to do sync replication across multiple GPUs. Further sync replication options will be coming, but I'm not certain of the time frame.

body: Sorry for the lack of updates, we do not at this time have a direct replacement for SyncReplicaOptimizer. On one machine you can use tf.contrib.distribute.MirroredStrategy to do sync replication across multiple GPUs. Further sync replication options will be coming, but I'm not certain of the time frame.
